Oh so you want a Nintendo Switch 2? Well not so fast, BUCKO! How does it compare to the red hot PC handheld gaming market, with heavy hitters like the Steam Deck (OG and OLED), Asus ROG Ally (Z1 Extreme and X), Lenovo Legion Go, Aya Neo 3, and MSI Claw? What about a PS Portal and PS5 Pro combo? We put them all to the test and let Linus’ son decide for himself which one he wants to take home.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1616590-i-let-my-son-pick-any-gaming-handheld-for-his-birthday/

Buy a PlayStation Portal: https://lmg.gg/Z8r5v
Buy a Nintendo Switch 2: https://lmg.gg/cMXtG
Buy a Nintendo Switch OLED: https://lmg.gg/LmzZV
Buy a Lenovo Legion Go (Z1 Extreme): https://lmg.gg/zmqhb
Buy an ASUS ROG Ally X: https://prsm2.com/MTFljZY
title: I Let My Son Pick ANY Gaming Handheld for His Birthday
